metadata.name: NFT Spot the Difference - The Mobile Game
metadata.description:
# **NFT Spot the Difference - The Mobile Game**

1st hyper casual mobile game to be released as an NFT. 

Based on the classic simple yet affective gameplay of spotting 10 differences between two images. This immensely effective, fun and very challenging game uses my own artworks that are sold as NFTs with the intention of providing utility to them. 

The game also built with the vision to provide utility for other creators and evolve into a self-sustaining platform that can receive continuous updates and levels.

## **Official Website**

http://www.nftspotthedifference.com

## **Featured artists on the game**

https://www.nftspotthedifference.com/featuredartists

## **FAQs - More info on the game**

https://www.nftspotthedifference.com/faqs

### **Game Discord Link**

https://discord.gg/FpvyQCKUNy

### **How to Get the Game**

Once you buy the game here, 

1. -- Join Discord.(Make sure you verify using the verify channel) Discord Link: https://discord.gg/FpvyQCKUNy 

2. -- Login and verify your NFT purchase using Collab.Land(Use channel collabland-join). 

3. -- The links should be available in the channel "game-links" at the very top. for platforms(iOS or Android).

Note: Game Demo Links are in the  "game-demo-links"  channel. You can download and play the 1st 3 levels for free and without joining Collab.Land.

### **What platforms do the Game support**

iOS & Android

### **How to Install the Game**

Please follow instructions here:  
https://www.nftspotthedifference.com/faqs?questionId=a29d33dd-2ec7-4c01-88ac-0d7f8dd40837&appDefId=14c92d28-031e-7910-c9a8-a670011e062d

Note: The game uses Apple's TestFlight for iOS and AppHost for android distribution.

### **How to Play**

Please follow instructions here:  
https://www.nftspotthedifference.com/faqs?questionId=4da62b3c-2c28-4bea-98de-4c7cbda6fb18&appDefId=14c92d28-031e-7910-c9a8-a670011e062d

### **Does the levels use NFT art? Does it/Can it feature other artists?**

Yes, The game uses art works that are minted/sold as NFTs by the game creator(Rohan Ganapathy). 

It also features levels with art works that are created by other prominent NFT creators. List of featured creators https://www.nftspotthedifference.com/featuredartists 

This is built with the idea of creating true utility for our artworks, and provide a fun interactive experience.

### **How does the game provide utility for collectors?**

1. -- All collectors who has brought art from the Creator's(Rohan Ganapathy) Foundation/KnownOrigin/OpenSea - RohanGanapathyArt collection, will have the game airdropped for free. 

2. -- Collectors of the game, will have constant feature up dates and levels added to the game to keep it fresh, engaging and fun. 

3. -- Collectors get a real interactive experience with art from some of their favourite creators. 

4. -- Collectors who are actively playing the game will receive NFT rewards. 

5. -- Access to the tight community of players who will help drive the game. 

6. -- Be able to suggest creators, for their art to possibly be a level in the game. 

7. -- Access to a NFT game that can be played from your device anywhere, anytime. 

8. -- Access to a game that can be played any age range. No matter if ur 5years or if you are 100 years old. 

9. -- With the added utility of the art being a level in a game, the value of the art increases for both the collector and artist.

### **How does the game provide utility for artists?**

1. -- For the 1st time creators get a chance to have their artworks have an interactive, engaging and fun element added to their art as utility by being a level on an actual Game. 

2. -- It also gives the chance to collectors to look more closely into an artwork and appreciate the artist more. 

3. -- The Artists will be prominently featured, marketed and cross promoted in all formats, The  game, website, portals and social, giving easy access to all collectors who own the game to visit each creator profiles featured in a level with ease. 

4. -- With the added utility of the art being a level in a game, the value of the art increases for both the collector and artist. 

5. -- Almost all kind of art can be integrated into the game, making it accessible to most if not all artistic styles.

### **Will the game be updated with new levels?**

Yes, The game will be regularly updated with new levels/features. The idea is to always keep the player community happy and engaged with the game.  
The game will have levels as long as there are NFT creators/artists.

### **How does rewards work?**

Please read: https://www.nftspotthedifference.com/faqs?questionId=f4abc6b7-9fc5-431b-9324-4d1ad220d3e2&appDefId=14c92d28-031e-7910-c9a8-a670011e062d

### **How to report Bugs/Issues or get support?**

For feedback, support or Issues/bugs please go to the home page of the website: www.nftspotthedifference.com 

Scroll down to "Report an Issue/Bug" section and please fill the form with all the relevant details and hit submit.  
or  
Please follow instructions here:  
https://www.nftspotthedifference.com/faqs?questionId=92f823c4-37dc-4604-9929-543a93daaafe&appDefId=14c92d28-031e-7910-c9a8-a670011e062d

### **Terms and conditions**

https://www.nftspotthedifference.com/termsandconditions
